title: The darkness is upon us. How to maintain your mental health when daylight-saving time ends
dc:creator: Jessica Roy
description: The clocks roll back an hour -- sigh -- on Nov. 6. Here's how to survive and stay sane when it gets dark outside at 5 p.m.
content:encoded: The clocks roll back an hour -- sigh -- on Nov. 6. Here's how to survive and stay sane when it gets dark outside at 5 p.m.

media:content.media:description: The sun sets behind the downtown Los Angeles skyline, as seen from the 6th Street bridge. (Kevin P. Casey / Los Angeles Times)
media:content.media:credit: Kevin P. Casey / Los Angeles Times
